refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: GValue provides an abstract container structure which can be copied, transformed and compared while holding a value of any (derived) type, which is registered as a GType with a GTypeValueTable in its GTypeInfo structure. Parameter specifications for most value types can be created as GParamSpec derived instances, to implement e.g. GObject properties which operate on GValue containers.

refsect2.title: G_IS_PARAM_SPEC_BOOLEAN()
refsect2.para: Return whether the given GParamSpec is of type G_TYPE_PARAM_BOOLEAN.

refsect2.title: G_PARAM_SPEC_BOOLEAN()
refsect2.para: Cast a GParamSpec instance into a GParamSpecBoolean.

refsect2.title: G_VALUE_HOLDS_BOOLEAN()
refsect2.para: Return whether the given GValue can hold values of type G_TYPE_BOOLEAN.

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_PARAM_BOOLEAN
refsect2.para: The GType of GParamSpecBoolean.

refsect2.title: struct GParamSpecBoolean
refsect2.para: A GParamSpec derived structure that contains the meta data for boolean properties.

listitem.simpara: default value for the property specified

refsect2.title: g_param_spec_boolean ()
refsect2.programlisting: GParamSpec* g_param_spec_boolean (const gchar *name, const gchar *nick, const gchar *blurb, gboolean default_value, GParamFlags flags);
refsect2.para: Creates a new GParamSpecBoolean instance specifying a G_TYPE_BOOLEAN property.
See g_param_spec_internal() for details on property names.

listitem.simpara: canonical name of the property specified
nick name for the property specified
default value for the property specified

refsect2.title: g_value_set_boolean ()
refsect2.para: Set the contents of a G_TYPE_BOOLEAN GValue to v_boolean.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of type G_TYPE_BOOLEAN

refsect2.title: g_value_get_boolean ()
refsect2.para: Get the contents of a G_TYPE_BOOLEAN GValue.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of type G_TYPE_BOOLEAN

refsect2.title: struct GParamSpecString
refsect2.para: A GParamSpec derived structure that contains the meta data for string properties.

listitem.simpara: default value for the property specified
a string containing the allowed values for the first byte
a string containing the allowed values for the subsequent bytes
the replacement byte for bytes which don't match cset_first or cset_nth.
replace NULL strings by an empty string

refsect2.title: gchararray
refsect2.para: A C representable type name for G_TYPE_STRING.

default value for the property specified

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of type G_TYPE_STRING

refsect2.title: g_value_set_static_string ()
refsect2.para: Set the contents of a G_TYPE_STRING GValue to v_string. The string is assumed to be static, and is thus not duplicated when setting the GValue.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of type G_TYPE_STRING

refsect2.title: g_value_take_string ()
refsect2.para: Sets the contents of a G_TYPE_STRING GValue to v_string.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of type G_TYPE_STRING
duplicated unowned string to be set

refsect2.para: Since 2.4

refsect2.title: g_value_set_string_take_ownership ()

warning.para: g_value_set_string_take_ownership is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. Use g_value_take_string() instead.

refsect2.para: This is an internal function introduced mainly for C marshallers.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of type G_TYPE_STRING
duplicated unowned string to be set

refsect2.title: g_value_get_string ()
refsect2.para: Get the contents of a G_TYPE_STRING GValue.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of type G_TYPE_STRING

refsect2.title: g_value_dup_string ()
refsect2.para: Get a copy the contents of a G_TYPE_STRING GValue.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of type G_TYPE_STRING
a newly allocated copy of the string content of value

refsect2.para: Get the contents of a G_TYPE_PARAM GValue.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue whose type is derived from G_TYPE_PARAM

refsect2.title: g_value_dup_param ()
refsect2.para: Get the contents of a G_TYPE_PARAM GValue, increasing its reference count.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue whose type is derived from G_TYPE_PARAM
GParamSpec content of value, should be unreferenced when no longer needed.

refsect2.title: G_IS_PARAM_SPEC_BOXED()
refsect2.para: Return whether the given GParamSpec is of type G_TYPE_PARAM_BOXED.

refsect2.title: G_PARAM_SPEC_BOXED()
refsect2.para: Cast a GParamSpec instance into a GParamSpecBoxed.

refsect2.title: G_VALUE_HOLDS_BOXED()
refsect2.para: Return whether the given GValue can hold values derived from type G_TYPE_BOXED.

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_PARAM_BOXED
refsect2.para: The GType of GParamSpecBoxed.

refsect2.title: struct GParamSpecBoxed
refsect2.para: A GParamSpec derived structure that contains the meta data for boxed properties.

refsect2.title: g_param_spec_boxed ()
refsect2.programlisting: GParamSpec* g_param_spec_boxed (const gchar *name, const gchar *nick, const gchar *blurb, GType boxed_type, GParamFlags flags);
refsect2.para: Creates a new GParamSpecBoxed instance specifying a G_TYPE_BOXED derived property.
See g_param_spec_internal() for details on property names.

listitem.simpara: canonical name of the property specified
nick name for the property specified
G_TYPE_BOXED derived type of this property

refsect2.title: g_value_set_boxed ()
refsect2.para: Set the contents of a G_TYPE_BOXED derived GValue to v_boxed.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of G_TYPE_BOXED derived type

refsect2.title: g_value_set_static_boxed ()
refsect2.para: Set the contents of a G_TYPE_BOXED derived GValue to v_boxed. The boxed value is assumed to be static, and is thus not duplicated when setting the GValue.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of G_TYPE_BOXED derived type
static boxed value to be set

refsect2.title: g_value_take_boxed ()

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of G_TYPE_BOXED derived type
duplicated unowned boxed value to be set

refsect2.para: Since 2.4

refsect2.title: g_value_set_boxed_take_ownership ()

warning.para: g_value_set_boxed_take_ownership is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. Use g_value_take_boxed() instead.

refsect2.para: This is an internal function introduced mainly for C marshallers.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of G_TYPE_BOXED derived type
duplicated unowned boxed value to be set

refsect2.title: g_value_get_boxed ()
refsect2.para: Get the contents of a G_TYPE_BOXED derived GValue.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of G_TYPE_BOXED derived type

refsect2.title: g_value_dup_boxed ()

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of G_TYPE_BOXED derived type

refsect2.title: G_IS_PARAM_SPEC_POINTER()
refsect2.para: Returns whether the given GParamSpec is of type G_TYPE_PARAM_POINTER.

refsect2.title: G_PARAM_SPEC_POINTER()
refsect2.para: Casts a GParamSpec instance into a GParamSpecPointer.

refsect2.title: G_VALUE_HOLDS_POINTER()
refsect2.para: Return whether the given GValue can hold values of type G_TYPE_POINTER.

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_PARAM_POINTER
refsect2.para: The GType of GParamSpecPointer.

refsect2.title: struct GParamSpecPointer
refsect2.para: A GParamSpec derived structure that contains the meta data for pointer properties.

refsect2.title: g_param_spec_pointer ()
refsect2.programlisting: GParamSpec* g_param_spec_pointer (const gchar *name, const gchar *nick, const gchar *blurb, GParamFlags flags);
refsect2.para: Creates a new GParamSpecPoiner instance specifying a pointer property.
See g_param_spec_internal() for details on property names.

listitem.simpara: canonical name of the property specified
nick name for the property specified

refsect2.title: g_value_set_pointer ()
refsect2.para: Set the contents of a pointer GValue to v_pointer.

refsect2.title: g_value_get_pointer ()
refsect2.para: Get the contents of a pointer GValue.

refsect2.title: G_IS_PARAM_SPEC_OBJECT()
refsect2.para: Returns whether the given GParamSpec is of type G_TYPE_PARAM_OBJECT.

refsect2.title: G_PARAM_SPEC_OBJECT()
refsect2.para: Casts a GParamSpec instance into a GParamSpecObject.

refsect2.title: G_VALUE_HOLDS_OBJECT()
refsect2.para: Return whether the given GValue can hold values derived from type G_TYPE_OBJECT.

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_PARAM_OBJECT
refsect2.para: The GType of GParamSpecObject.

refsect2.title: struct GParamSpecObject
refsect2.para: A GParamSpec derived structure that contains the meta data for object properties.

refsect2.title: g_param_spec_object ()
refsect2.programlisting: GParamSpec* g_param_spec_object (const gchar *name, const gchar *nick, const gchar *blurb, GType object_type, GParamFlags flags);
refsect2.para: Creates a new GParamSpecBoxed instance specifying a G_TYPE_OBJECT derived property.
See g_param_spec_internal() for details on property names.

listitem.simpara: canonical name of the property specified
nick name for the property specified
G_TYPE_OBJECT derived type of this property

refsect2.title: g_value_set_object ()
refsect2.para: Set the contents of a G_TYPE_OBJECT derived GValue to v_object.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of G_TYPE_OBJECT derived type

refsect2.title: g_value_take_object ()

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of G_TYPE_OBJECT derived type

refsect2.para: Since 2.4

refsect2.title: g_value_set_object_take_ownership ()

warning.para: g_value_set_object_take_ownership is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. Use g_value_take_object() instead.

refsect2.para: This is an internal function introduced mainly for C marshallers.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of G_TYPE_OBJECT derived type

refsect2.title: g_value_get_object ()
refsect2.para: Get the contents of a G_TYPE_OBJECT derived GValue.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue of G_TYPE_OBJECT derived type

refsect2.title: g_value_dup_object ()
refsect2.para: Get the contents of a G_TYPE_OBJECT derived GValue, increasing its reference count.

listitem.simpara: a valid GValue whose type is derived from G_TYPE_OBJECT
object content of value, should be unreferenced when no longer needed.

refsect2.title: G_IS_PARAM_SPEC_UNICHAR()
refsect2.para: Return whether the given GParamSpec is of type G_TYPE_PARAM_UNICHAR.

refsect2.title: G_PARAM_SPEC_UNICHAR()
refsect2.para: Cast a GParamSpec instance into a GParamSpecUnichar.

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_PARAM_UNICHAR
refsect2.para: The GType of GParamSpecUnichar.

refsect2.title: struct GParamSpecUnichar
refsect2.para: A GParamSpec derived structure that contains the meta data for unichar (unsigned integer) properties.

listitem.simpara: default value for the property specified

refsect2.title: g_param_spec_unichar ()
refsect2.programlisting: GParamSpec* g_param_spec_unichar (const gchar *name, const gchar *nick, const gchar *blurb, gunichar default_value, GParamFlags flags);
refsect2.para: Creates a new GParamSpecUnichar instance specifying a G_TYPE_UINT property. GValue structures for this property can be accessed with g_value_set_uint() and g_value_get_uint().
See g_param_spec_internal() for details on property names.

listitem.simpara: canonical name of the property specified
nick name for the property specified
default value for the property specified

refsect2.title: G_IS_PARAM_SPEC_VALUE_ARRAY()
refsect2.para: Return whether the given GParamSpec is of type G_TYPE_PARAM_VALUE_ARRAY.

refsect2.title: G_PARAM_SPEC_VALUE_ARRAY()
refsect2.para: Cast a GParamSpec instance into a GParamSpecValueArray.

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_PARAM_VALUE_ARRAY
refsect2.para: The GType of GParamSpecValueArray.

refsect2.title: struct GParamSpecValueArray
refsect2.para: A GParamSpec derived structure that contains the meta data for GValueArray properties.

listitem.simpara: a GParamSpec describing the elements contained in arrays of this property, may be NULL
if greater than 0, arrays of this property will always have this many elements

refsect2.title: g_param_spec_value_array ()
refsect2.programlisting: GParamSpec* g_param_spec_value_array (const gchar *name, const gchar *nick, const gchar *blurb, GParamSpec *element_spec, GParamFlags flags);
refsect2.para: Creates a new GParamSpecValueArray instance specifying a G_TYPE_VALUE_ARRAY property. G_TYPE_VALUE_ARRAY is a G_TYPE_BOXED type, as such, GValue structures for this property can be accessed with g_value_set_boxed() and g_value_get_boxed().
See g_param_spec_internal() for details on property names.

listitem.simpara: canonical name of the property specified
nick name for the property specified
a GParamSpec describing the elements contained in arrays of this property, may be NULL

refsect2.title: G_IS_PARAM_SPEC_OVERRIDE()
refsect2.para: Returns whether the given GParamSpec is of type G_TYPE_PARAM_OBJECT.
Since 2.4

refsect2.title: G_PARAM_SPEC_OVERRIDE()
refsect2.para: Casts a GParamSpec into a GParamSpecObject.
Since 2.4

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_PARAM_OVERRIDE
refsect2.para: The GType of GParamSpecOverride.
Since 2.4

refsect2.title: struct GParamSpecOverride
refsect2.para: This is a type of GParamSpec type that simply redirects operations to another paramspec. All operations other than getting or setting the value are redirected, including accessing the nick and blurb, validating a value, and so forth. See g_param_spec_get_redirect_target() for retrieving the overidden property. GParamSpecOverride is used in implementing g_object_class_override_property(), and will not be directly useful unless you are implementing a new base type similar to GObject.
Since 2.4

refsect2.title: g_param_spec_override ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new property of type GParamSpecOverride. This is used to direct operations to another paramspec, and will not be directly useful unless you are implementing a new base type similar to GObject.

listitem.simpara: The property that is being overridden

refsect2.para: Since 2.4
